sn15.13:1.2: Atha kho timsamatta paveyyaka bhikkhu sabbe arannika sabbe pindapatika sabbe pamsukulika sabbe tecivarika sabbe sasamyojana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
sn15.13:1.4: “ime kho timsamatta paveyyaka bhikkhu sabbe arannika sabbe pindapatika sabbe pamsukulika sabbe tecivarika sabbe sasamyojana.
sn15.13:1.5: Yannunaham imesam tatha dhammam deseyyam yatha nesam imasmimyeva asane anupadaya asavehi cittani vimucceyyun”ti.
sn15.13:2.2: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.13:2.3: Tam kim mannatha, bhikkhave, katamam nu kho bahutaram, yam va vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam, yam va catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti?
sn15.13:2.4: “Yatha kho mayam, bhante, bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanama, etadeva, bhante, bahutaram, yam no imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakan”ti.
sn15.13:3.1: “Sadhu sadhu, bhikkhave, sadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, evam dhammam desitam ajanatha.
sn15.13:3.2: Etadeva, bhikkhave, bahutaram, yam vo imina dighena addhuna sandhavatam samsaratam sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.13:3.3: Digharattam vo, bhikkhave, gunnam satam gobhutanam sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.13:3.4: Digharattam vo, bhikkhave, mahimsanam satam mahimsabhutanam sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam …pe…
sn15.13:3.5: digharattam vo, bhikkhave, urabbhanam satam urabbhabhutanam …pe…
sn15.13:3.10: digharattam vo, bhikkhave, cora gamaghatati gahetva sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam.
sn15.13:3.11: Digharattam vo, bhikkhave, cora paripanthikati gahetva sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam.
sn15.13:3.12: Digharattam vo, bhikkhave, cora paradarikati gahetva sisacchinnanam lohitam passannam paggharitam, na tveva catusu mahasamuddesu udakam.
sn15.13:4.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
sn15.13:4.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane timsamattanam paveyyakanam bhikkhunam anupadaya asavehi cittani vimuccimsuti.
